# criblio_group (Data Source)

Group DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "criblio_group" "my_group" {
  fields = "git.commit,git.localChanges"
  id     = "workers-west"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Group id

### Optional

- `fields` (String) fields to add to results: git.commit, git.localChanges, git.log
